subject: Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The only horse in a one-horse stable, Somebeachsomewhere will be the 2-5 favorite when he races nine harness horses at the Meadowlands on Saturday.
snippet: The only horse in a one-horse stable, Somebeachsomewhere will be the 2-5 favorite when he races nine harness horses at the Meadowlands on Saturday.
